title: Debtor's Chip Devin
description: Pay up or else! Debtor’s Chip deals with the downward spiral of the life of a man that seemingly had it all yet decided to let it all slip between his fingers. Heather Toye’s new digital short series is sure to make you gasp, cringe and shake your head. Getting to the heart of the matter like a chainsaw unleashed is soon to be Heather’s dark ,brooding, and hard-boiled from beginning to end, don’t miss Debtor’s Chip/Devin.HR Toye lives with her husband and fellow author Cody Toye and son, Gideon in SW Missouri. She is an avid reader and writer of thriller and suspense.
author: H.R. Toye
